Package tasklist

Class TaskList

  • java.lang.Object
    • tasklist.TaskList
  • public class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object
    The `TaskList` class represents a collection of tasks in the BloopBot application. It provides methods to manipulate the task list, such as adding, deleting, marking, and displaying tasks. This class also allows for loading tasks from another `tasklist` object.
    Version:
    0.0.0
    Author:
    raydenlim

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TaskList()
      Constructs a new `TaskList` object with an empty list of tasks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskList

        public TaskList()
        Constructs a new `TaskList` object with an empty list of tasks.

    • Method Detail

      • addTask

        public void addTask​(Task taskDesc)
        Adds a task to the task list.
        Parameters:
        taskDesc - The task to be added.

      • displayTasks

        public void displayTasks()
        Displays the tasks in the task list. If the list is empty, a message indicating no tasks are present is displayed.

      • doneAndDusted

        public void doneAndDusted​(int taskNum)
        Marks a task as completed in the task list.
        Parameters:
        taskNum - The index of the task to be marked as completed.

      • notDoneNotDusted

        public void notDoneNotDusted​(int taskNum)
        Marks a task as not completed in the task list.
        Parameters:
        taskNum - The index of the task to be marked as not completed.

      • isMarked

        public boolean isMarked​(int taskNum)
        Checks if a task is marked as completed.
        Parameters:
        taskNum - The index of the task to be checked.
        Returns:
        `true` if the task is marked as completed, `false` otherwise.

      • deleteTask

        public Task deleteTask​(int taskNum)
        Deletes a task from the task list.
        Parameters:
        taskNum - The index of the task to be deleted.
        Returns:
        The deleted task.

      • getTasks

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> getTasks()
        Retrieves the list of tasks.
        Returns:
        The list of tasks.

      • getTaskCount

        public int getTaskCount()
        Retrieves the number of tasks in the task list.
        Returns:
        The number of tasks in the task list.

      • loadTasks

        public void loadTasks​(TaskList loadedTasks)
        Loads tasks from another `TaskList` object, replacing the current task list.
        Parameters:
        loadedTasks - The `TaskList` object from which tasks will be loaded.
